name: UIS Service Categories
description: Service categories for the Urbalurba Infrastructure Stack

hasCategoryCode.name: AI & Machine Learning
hasCategoryCode.abstract: AI and machine learning services for local LLM inference and API management.
hasCategoryCode.summary: Local AI infrastructure with OpenWebUI for chat interface, Ollama for LLM inference, and LiteLLM for unified API access to multiple models.

hasCategoryCode.name: Authentication & SSO
hasCategoryCode.abstract: Identity management and single sign-on services.
hasCategoryCode.summary: Authentik provides enterprise-grade SSO, OAuth2/OIDC provider, and identity management with blueprints for automated configuration.

hasCategoryCode.name: Databases
hasCategoryCode.abstract: Relational, document, and vector database services.
hasCategoryCode.summary: Production-ready databases including PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, and Qdrant vector database for AI applications.

hasCategoryCode.name: Observability & Monitoring
hasCategoryCode.abstract: Full observability stack for metrics, logs, and traces.
hasCategoryCode.summary: Complete observability with Grafana dashboards, Prometheus metrics, Loki log aggregation, and Tempo distributed tracing.

hasCategoryCode.name: Message Queues & Caching
hasCategoryCode.summary: RabbitMQ for message queuing and Redis for caching, session storage, and pub/sub messaging.

hasCategoryCode.name: Search & Indexing
hasCategoryCode.summary: Elasticsearch for powerful full-text search, log analysis, and data indexing capabilities.

hasCategoryCode.name: Data Science & Analytics
hasCategoryCode.abstract: Data science platforms and analytics tools.
hasCategoryCode.summary: Apache Spark for distributed computing, JupyterHub for collaborative notebooks, and Unity Catalog for data governance.

hasCategoryCode.name: Core Infrastructure
hasCategoryCode.abstract: Core infrastructure components for routing and storage.
hasCategoryCode.summary: Essential infrastructure including Traefik ingress controller, persistent storage, and networking configuration.

hasCategoryCode.name: Management Tools
hasCategoryCode.summary: Management UIs including pgAdmin for PostgreSQL, RedisInsight for Redis, and other administrative tools.

hasCategoryCode.name: Development Tools
hasCategoryCode.summary: ArgoCD for GitOps deployments and other development workflow tools.
